name: Turbo Galaxy
description:
Turbo Galaxy is a fast-paced arcade score-chaser. 

Balance your fuel gauge on a razor's edge to maximize your haul! 

Dance with death to ascend the ranks! 

Reach top speed, then go further!

Good luck!

CONTROLS:

hold left mouse button - move

release left mouse button - shoot

esc - toggle fullscreen

SOUNDTRACK:

https://pulsebombu.bandcamp.com/album/turbo-galaxy-soundtrack

NOTE: 

This game was designed and balanced for play on touchscreen devices. Scroll down for a link to the Google Play version.
